tree.name: Jimmy Butler III
tree.tradeDescription: 5-team trade: Warriors acquired Butler from Heat

assetsGivenUp.name: Andrew Wiggins
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Traded from Minnesota with picks for D'Angelo Russell and others

assetsGivenUp.name: D'Angelo Russell
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Sign-and-trade from Brooklyn Nets for Kevin Durant

assetsGivenUp.name: Kevin Durant
assetsGivenUp.note: Signed as free agent from Oklahoma City Thunder. Sent to BKN in sign-and-trade.

assetsGivenUp.name: Omari Spellman
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Atlanta for Damian Jones and a 2026 2nd round pick

assetsGivenUp.name: Kyle Anderson
assetsGivenUp.note: UCLA forward, joined via sign-and-trade from Minnesota Timberwolves

assetsGivenUp.name: Dennis Schroder
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Warriors acquire Schroder and 2025 2nd (via MIA) from Nets for Melton, Beekman, and three 2nd-round picks
assetsGivenUp.note: German veteran PG, averaging 18.4 ppg and 6.6 apg at time of trade

assetsGivenUp.name: De'Anthony Melton
assetsGivenUp.note: Signed via mid-level exception from Philadelphia. Out for season with torn ACL at time of trade.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2026 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: GSW own 2nd rounder sent to Brooklyn

assetsGivenUp.name: 2027 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: GSW own 2nd rounder sent to Brooklyn

assetsGivenUp.name: 2029 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: GSW own 2nd rounder sent to Brooklyn

assetsGivenUp.name: Lindy Waters III
assetsGivenUp.note: Signed as undrafted free agent by Oklahoma City Thunder in 2022

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 1st Round Pick (top-10 protected)
assetsGivenUp.note: Warriors' own first-round pick sent to MIA, top-10 protected. Did NOT convey in 2025 (GSW had #1 pick). Rolls to 2026 top-10 protected.
